title: Getting Started with BillToSheet
description: Learn how to convert your first invoice PDF to CSV or Excel format with BillToSheet. Step-by-step guide for beginners.
metaTitle: Getting Started with BillToSheet | Invoice Converter Tutorial
metaDescription: Learn how to convert invoice PDFs to CSV and Excel. Complete beginner's guide to using BillToSheet invoice converter.

faqs.question: How do I convert my first invoice?
faqs.answer: Simply visit the homepage, click the upload area or drag and drop your PDF invoice. The conversion happens automatically and you'll be able to download CSV and Excel files within seconds.

faqs.question: Do I need to create an account?
faqs.answer: No, you can convert one invoice for free without creating an account. For additional conversions and to save your conversion history, create a free account.

title: Supported Invoice Formats
description: Learn which invoice formats and types are supported by BillToSheet. Compatible with invoices from major platforms and accounting software.
metaDescription: See which invoice formats BillToSheet supports. Compatible with invoices from Amazon, Stripe, QuickBooks, Xero, and more.

faqs.question: What invoice formats are supported?
faqs.answer: BillToSheet supports standard PDF invoices from major platforms including Amazon, Stripe, PayPal, QuickBooks, Xero, FreshBooks, and most other business software.

faqs.question: Can I upload scanned invoices?
faqs.answer: Yes, as long as the scanned invoice is in PDF format with readable text. For best results, use digital PDF invoices rather than low-quality scans.

title: Understanding Credits
description: Learn how the BillToSheet credits system works. Information about free conversions, purchasing credits, and credit usage.
metaTitle: BillToSheet Credits System | How Credits Work
metaDescription: Understand how BillToSheet credits work. Learn about free conversions, purchasing credit packs, and managing your credit balance.

faqs.question: How many credits do I need?
faqs.answer: Each invoice conversion uses 1 credit. You get 1 free conversion without an account. After signing in, purchase credit packs: 25 credits for £9, 100 for £19, or 500 for £49.

faqs.question: Do credits expire?
faqs.answer: No, your purchased credits never expire. You can use them at any time, and they remain in your account until used.

title: Downloading Your Converted Files
description: Learn how to download your converted invoice files in CSV and Excel formats. Access your conversion history and re-download files.
metaTitle: Download Converted Invoice Files | BillToSheet Guide
metaDescription: Learn how to download your converted invoice files as CSV or Excel. Access your conversion history and re-download files.

faqs.question: What file formats can I download?
faqs.answer: You can download three files for each conversion: invoice_details.csv, line_items.csv, and combined.xlsx (Excel with two sheets).

faqs.question: How long are my files stored?
faqs.answer: For logged-in users, converted files are stored for 30 days. Anonymous conversions are available only during your session.

title: Data Security and Privacy
description: Learn how BillToSheet protects your invoice data. Information about data storage, privacy, and security measures.
metaTitle: BillToSheet Data Security | Privacy and Protection
metaDescription: Learn how BillToSheet protects your invoice data. Information about encryption, storage, and privacy measures.

faqs.question: Is my invoice data secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, we use industry-standard security measures. Your original PDF files are not stored after processing. Converted files are stored securely for 30 days then automatically deleted.

faqs.question: Who can access my converted invoices?
faqs.answer: Only you can access your converted invoices. Each conversion has a unique ID and is accessible only through your account or session.

title: Excel File Format and Structure
description: Understand the structure of Excel files generated by BillToSheet. Learn about sheets, columns, and data organization.
metaTitle: BillToSheet Excel Format | Excel File Structure Guide
metaDescription: Learn about the Excel file format generated by BillToSheet. Understand sheets structure, columns, and data organization.

faqs.question: How is the Excel file structured?
faqs.answer: The Excel file contains two sheets: 'Invoice Details' with header information (vendor, date, totals) and 'Line Items' with individual product/service rows.

faqs.question: Can I customize the Excel format?
faqs.answer: The current version uses a standardized format optimized for accounting software import. Custom formatting options may be added in future updates.

title: Troubleshooting Common Issues
description: Solutions to common problems when converting invoices. Fix upload errors, conversion failures, and download issues.
metaDescription: Solve common BillToSheet issues. Fix upload errors, conversion problems, and download issues with our troubleshooting guide.

faqs.question: Why won't my invoice upload?
faqs.answer: Ensure your file is a PDF under 10MB. Check that you're using a supported browser. If the issue persists, try a different browser or contact support.

faqs.question: What if the extracted data is incorrect?
faqs.answer: Our system is optimized for standard invoice formats. If data extraction is inaccurate, ensure your PDF is text-based (not a low-quality image scan).

metaDescription: Access BillToSheet's invoice conversion API. Integrate PDF to CSV/Excel conversion into your applications and workflows.

faqs.question: Is there an API available?
faqs.answer: API access is planned for future releases. Contact us if you're interested in early access or have specific integration requirements.

title: Bulk Invoice Conversion Guide
description: Learn how to convert multiple invoices at once with BillToSheet's bulk conversion feature. Process dozens of invoices simultaneously with live progress tracking.
metaTitle: Bulk Invoice Conversion | Convert Multiple PDFs at Once
metaDescription: Convert multiple invoices simultaneously with BillToSheet bulk conversion. Process dozens of PDFs at once with concurrent processing and live status updates.

faqs.question: How do I convert multiple invoices at once?
faqs.answer: Sign in to your dashboard and click 'Bulk Convert' in the top right. You can drag and drop multiple PDF files or select them from your computer. All files will process concurrently, and you'll see live status updates for each file as it completes.

faqs.question: How many invoices can I convert at once?
faqs.answer: You can upload as many invoices as you have credits for. There's no hard limit on the number of files - just make sure you have enough credits (1 credit per successful conversion).

faqs.question: Do all files process at the same time?
faqs.answer: Yes! BillToSheet processes all files concurrently, not one after another. This means if you upload 10 invoices, all 10 start processing immediately, dramatically reducing total processing time.

faqs.question: What happens if one file fails?
faqs.answer: Failed conversions don't use credits and are clearly marked in the results table. You can see which files succeeded and which failed, with error messages for failed conversions. Only successful conversions are saved to your dashboard.

faqs.question: Can I download files individually from bulk conversion?
faqs.answer: Yes! Each successful conversion in the bulk results table has download links for CSV, Line Items CSV, Excel, and a View link to see the full details. You can download files individually or access them all from your dashboard.

faqs.question: How much faster is bulk conversion?
faqs.answer: Bulk conversion processes files concurrently, so 10 invoices take roughly the same time as 1 invoice (instead of 10x longer). This can save hours when processing monthly invoice batches.

title: Refund and Credit Policy
description: Information about BillToSheet's refund policy, credit adjustments, and satisfaction guarantee.
metaTitle: BillToSheet Refund Policy | Credits and Refunds
metaDescription: Learn about BillToSheet's refund policy, credit adjustments, and satisfaction guarantee.

faqs.question: What is your refund policy?
faqs.answer: If you're not satisfied with a conversion, contact us within 7 days for a credit refund. We'll review the issue and refund credits if appropriate.

faqs.question: Can I get a refund on unused credits?
faqs.answer: Credit purchases are generally non-refundable, but we'll consider refund requests on a case-by-case basis. Contact support to discuss your situation.
